name: Ancient Den
oracle_text: {T}: Add {W}.
flavor_text: Taj-Nar, throne of Raksha Golden Cub, destined leader of the leonin prides.

name: Arc Lightning
oracle_text: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.
flavor_text: Rainclouds don't last long in Shiv, but that doesn't stop the lightning.

name: Arsenal Thresher
oracle_text: As Arsenal Thresher enters the battlefield, you may reveal any number of other artifact cards from your hand. Arsenal Thresher enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each card revealed this way.

name: Battlegate Mimic
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell that's both red and white, Battlegate Mimic has base power and toughness 4/2 until end of turn and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: Mimics don't need perfect disguises. They need only the perfect victims: the naive, the young, or the poor of sight.

name: Beast Hunt
oracle_text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Surely we could tame something besides hurdas and pillarfield oxen!"
—Sheyda, Ondu gamekeeper

name: Bogardan Firefiend
oracle_text: When Bogardan Firefiend dies, it deals 2 damage to target creature.
flavor_text:
"The next one who tells me to relax and curl up by a fire is dead."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

name: Bogardan Rager
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Bogardan Rager enters the battlefield, target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: In the erupting heart of Bogardan, it's hard to tell hurtling volcanic rocks from pouncing volcanic beasts.

name: Boros Garrison
oracle_text:
Boros Garrison enters the battlefield tapped.
When Boros Garrison enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {R}{W}.

name: Boros Signet
flavor_text:
"Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size—a weight of strength and of pride."
—Agrus Kos

name: Branching Bolt
oracle_text:
Choose one or both —
• Branching Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature with flying.
• Branching Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature without flying.
flavor_text:
"Lightning lives in everything, in living flesh and growing things. It must be set free."
—Rakka Mar

name: Cadaverous Knight
oracle_text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{1}{B}{B}: Regenerate Cadaverous Knight.
flavor_text:
Grieve for the soul in death dishonored.
—Shadow Guild saying

name: Cerodon Yearling
oracle_text: Vigilance, haste
flavor_text: The unit of measurement used to chart a cerodon's growth is "persons consumed."

name: Congregate
oracle_text: Target player gains 2 life for each creature on the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"In the gathering there is strength for all who founder, renewal for all who languish, love for all who sing."
—*Song of All*, canto 642

name: Copper Myr
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: The elves thought of the myr as minor threats, just as the myr thought of the elves.

name: Cruel Revival
oracle_text: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Return up to one target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Few Cabal fighters fear death. They fear what follows it.

name: Dark Ritual
oracle_text: Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor_text:
"If there is such a thing as too much power, I have not discovered it."
—Volrath

name: Double Cleave
oracle_text: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor_text: "When in doubt, kill 'em twice."

name: Dregscape Zombie
oracle_text: Unearth {B} ({B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: The undead of Grixis are fueled by their hatred of the living.

name: Fertile Ground
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

name: Fertilid
oracle_text:
Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.

name: Festering Goblin
oracle_text: When Festering Goblin dies, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: In life, it was a fetid, disease-ridden thing. In death, not much changed.

name: Gold Myr
oracle_text: {T}: Add {W}.
flavor_text: The leonin thought of the myr as omens, never imagining the sinister fate they foretold.

name: Gravedigger
oracle_text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Oddly, no one questioned the Cabal's wisdom in hiring a zombie to work at the cemetery.

name: Great Furnace
oracle_text: {T}: Add {R}.
flavor_text: Kuldotha, wellspring of molten metal, temple of the goblin horde.

name: Gruul Turf
oracle_text:
Gruul Turf enters the battlefield tapped.
When Gruul Turf enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {R}{G}.

name: Hideous End
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
flavor_text:
"A little dark magic won't stop me. The worse the curse, the better the prize."
—Radavi, Joraga relic hunter, last words

name: Hull Breach
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Destroy target artifact and target enchantment.
flavor_text: "Crovax knows we're coming now," said a grinning Sisay. "I just sent the *Predator* crashing into his stronghold."

name: Innocent Blood
oracle_text: Each player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: Zombies mourn for the living and celebrate those who will soon be given the gift of death.

name: Iron Myr
oracle_text: {T}: Add {R}.
flavor_text: The goblins didn't think of the myr at all, which allowed the myr to observe everywhere unhindered.

name: Keep Watch
oracle_text: Draw a card for each attacking creature.
flavor_text: "I see their moral dilemmas. I see their raw courage. I see their self-sacrifice. I see our victory."

name: Kor Sanctifiers
oracle_text:
Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.)
When Kor Sanctifiers enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: "Why keep such trinkets? They only add weight to your travels."

name: Leaden Myr
oracle_text: {T}: Add {B}.
flavor_text: The Moriok saw the myr as fellow scavengers, never knowing just who the myr were scavenging for.

name: Myr Enforcer
oracle_text: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
flavor_text: Most myr monitor other species. Some myr monitor other myr.

name: Oblivion Ring
oracle_text:
When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.
When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Orim's Thunder
oracle_text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If this spell was kicked, it deals damage equal to that permanent's mana value to target creature.

name: Pentad Prism
oracle_text:
Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
Remove a charge counter from Pentad Prism: Add one mana of any color.

name: Phyrexian Ghoul
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.

name: Rampant Growth
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Nature grows solutions to its problems.

name: Reckless Charge
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Relic of Progenitus
oracle_text:
{T}: Target player exiles a card from their graveyard.
{1}, Exile Relic of Progenitus: Exile all graveyards. Draw a card.
flavor_text: Elves believe the hydra-god Progenitus sleeps beneath Naya, feeding on forgotten magics.

name: Rolling Thunder
oracle_text: Rolling Thunder deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.
flavor_text: "Such rage," thought Vhati, gazing up at the thunderhead from the *Predator*. "It is Greven's mind manifest."

name: Rotting Rats
oracle_text:
When Rotting Rats enters the battlefield, each player discards a card.
Unearth {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Sarcomite Myr
oracle_text:
{2}: Sarcomite Myr gains flying until end of turn.
{2}, Sacrifice Sarcomite Myr: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"A horrible sight, yes, but the sounds . . . Its twanging tendons and grinding gears are almost musical."
—Brudiclad, Telchor engineer

name: Search for Tomorrow
oracle_text:
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Suspend 2—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

name: Seat of the Synod
oracle_text: {T}: Add {U}.
flavor_text: Lumengrid, site of the Knowledge Pool, source of vedalken arcana.

name: Shepherd of Rot
oracle_text: {T}: Each player loses 1 life for each Zombie on the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"My priests swore loyalty to the Cabal not until death, but beyond it."
—Cabal Patriarch

name: Silverglade Elemental
oracle_text: When Silverglade Elemental enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

name: Silver Myr
oracle_text: {T}: Add {U}.
flavor_text: The vedalken saw the myr as toys, unaware of the intelligence lurking behind their empty eyes.

name: Smokebraider
oracle_text: {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Elemental spells or activate abilities of Elementals.
flavor_text: "Be silent and listen to your inner fire. Only then can you walk the Path of Flame."

name: Soul Warden
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "One does not question the size or shape of the grains of sand in an hourglass. Nor do I question the temperament of the souls under my guidance."

name: Suntouched Myr
oracle_text: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
flavor_text: As the fifth sun joins the other four, new abilities awaken in the creatures of Mirrodin.

name: Syphon Mind
oracle_text: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.
flavor_text: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.

name: Syphon Soul
oracle_text: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
flavor_text: As Phage drank their energy, a vague memory of Jeska stirred. Then she lost herself again in the joy of her victims' suffering.

name: Terramorphic Expanse
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

name: Tree of Tales
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: Tel-Jilad, sanctum of the ancient trolls, keepers of the secret of Mirrodin's origin.

name: Vault of Whispers
oracle_text: {T}: Add {B}.
flavor_text: Ish Sah, den of the warlord Geth, commander of countless nim.

name: Vedalken Engineer
oracle_text: {T}: Add two mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.
flavor_text: Art is unknown to the vedalken—for them, all creations must serve a purpose.

name: Whiplash Trap
oracle_text:
If an opponent had two or more creatures enter the battlefield under their control this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

name: Wizard Replica
oracle_text:
Flying
{U}, Sacrifice Wizard Replica: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
flavor_text: It responds with unnatural precision.
